name: Slimebow
description:
As you rush along the rainbow, match yourself to the colours of the objects crashing towards you! Consecutively matching the correct colours and passing through them while jumping over the one-hit-kill black objects will net you progressively higher scores. 3 missteps and it's game over!

Tap space to jump and use the number keys (1-7) to change your form to match the colours coming towards you!
